thread.section_title: Arsenal defender Laurent Koscielny is not world-class, says Charlie Nicholas – Metro
thread.title: Arsenal defender Laurent Koscielny is not world-class, says Charlie Nicholas
thread.title_full: Arsenal defender Laurent Koscielny is not world-class, says Charlie Nicholas

author: louissealey1
title: Arsenal defender Laurent Koscielny is not world-class, says Charlie Nicholas
text:
Arsenal defender Laurent Koscielny (Picture: Getty) Arsenal star Laurent Koscielny cannot be labelled as a ‘world-class defender’, according to Gunners legend Charlie Nicholas.
Koscielny, 31, has become an integral member of Arsene Wenger’s side since signing from Lorient in 2010.
How could Man Utd line up v Chelsea in Ibrahimovic’s absence? The France international has played over 200 league games for the club, helping the north London outfit to two FA Cup triumphs.
Koscielny is generally seen as one of the best centre-backs in the Premier League but Nicholas has dismissed the claim that he is world-class.
‘Arsenal will do what they do, they’ll win the game [against Bayern Munich] but they’ll come nowhere close to qualifying because they can’t defend,’ Nicholas told Sky Sports .
‘Please stop telling me Laurent Koscielny is a world-class defender.
Arsenal fixtures Bayern Munich – Champions League (H) – Tue 7 Mar
Lincoln – FA Cup (H) – 11 Mar

‘I expect Arsenal’s attack to get them one or two ahead with Sanchez fired up, people will start to believe is it possible but it won’t be saying.
‘Arsenal tend to do well when they’re not expected to win and will hopefully produce a good performance for the fans at the very least.’
